aguiaj.iscte

Class Dimension

  • java.lang.Object
    • aguiaj.iscte.Dimension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aguiaj.draw.IDimension, java.lang.Comparable<Dimension>

    public final class Dimension
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Dimension>, aguiaj.draw.IDimension
    Represents constant rectangular dimensions.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos
